conbody.p: Logical terms let you combine other expressions using Boolean logic. N1QL provides the following logical operators:

section.title: AND
section.p: AND evaluates to TRUE only if both conditions are TRUE.

section.title: OR
section.p: OR evaluates to TRUE if one of the conditions is TRUE.

section.title: NOT
section.p: NOT evaluates to TRUE if the expression does not match the condition.
